definition: Share of applicants who were admitted. Computed as admissions divided by applications.
Share of admitted students who enrolled. Computed as enrolled divided by admissions.
Total number of undergraduate applications received.
Number of admitted students who enrolled (used for admissions yield).
Percent of first-time, full-time undergraduates who return the following fall.

metric_group: Graduation Rate - Bachelor Degree Within 6 Years
definition: Share of the first-time, full-time cohort completing a bachelor degree within 150% of normal time (typically 6 years).

metric_group: Graduation Rate - Bachelor Degree Within 4 Years
definition: Share of the first-time, full-time cohort completing a bachelor degree within 4 years.

metric_group: Graduation Rate - Bachelor Degree Within 5 Years
definition: Share of the first-time, full-time cohort completing a bachelor degree within 5 years (cumulative).
Percent of relevant students receiving Pell Grant aid.

metric_group: Average Amount of Pell Grant Aid
definition: Average Pell Grant dollars among Pell recipients.
Average federal loan dollars among student loan recipients.
Student-to-faculty ratio reported by the institution.

metric_group: Median Earnings 6 Years After Entry Latest Snapshot
definition: Latest non-suppressed median earnings for former students measured 6 years after entry.

metric_group: Median Earnings 10 Years After Entry Latest Snapshot
definition: Latest non-suppressed median earnings for former students measured 10 years after entry.

metric_group: Average net price-students awarded grant or scholarship aid
definition: Average net price for full-time, first-time degree or certificate-seeking undergraduates who were awarded grant or scholarship aid (federal, state or local governments, or the institution).
source: IPEDS Data Center COST2 (2023-24 from COST2_2024); prior years aligned to IPEDS SFA net price series
